channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Propaganda Press Upset Trump Could Shut Down CISA’s Election Censorship

item.title: Nvidia says America’s trade war with China is hurting revenue, warning Trump’s tariffs have added a big ‘unknown’ to its future outlook
item.description: CEO Jensen Huang said Nvidia sales in China are half of what they were before export controls.

item.title: GSK could double CEO Emma Walmsley’s pay to $27 million in bid to bring U.K. exec salaries in line with the U.S.
item.description: The British pharma giant said Emma Walmsley's current pay could put off candidates for her eventual successor.

item.title: Trump Should Take a Bite out of Nonsensical Laws
item.description: An insane number of things are classified as federal crimes, and that doesn’t even include the labyrinth of federal rules Americans are subject to.

item.title: GOP Rep. Joe Wilson trumpets 'Make Iraq Great Again!' message
item.description: Republican Rep. Joe Wilson of South Carolina shared the message "Make Iraq Great Again!" The congressman has indicated that Iran controls Iraq.

item.title: Why Zelenskyy keeps pushing for Ukraine NATO membership even though Trump says it's not happening
item.description: Zelenskyy remains adamant about NATO membership for Ukraine because it means that other security guarantees are more likely, experts say.

item.title: Why AT&T’s CFO is hoping Congress will extend Trump’s corporate tax cuts
item.description: The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act factors into how companies are determining future planning.

item.title: A Modest Republican Budget Plan
item.description: Far from being draconian, the House-passed budget resolution would cut spending by a relatively small amount.

item.title: Trump’s Pick To Lead The Navy Signals Commitment To Rebuilding America’s Depleted Maritime Fleet
item.description: Rebuilding America's naval fleet will be a priority for the Trump admin, Navy Secretary nominee John Phelan told lawmakers on Thursday.

item.title: Prada heiress who took the fashion label to new highs with Miu Miu, is eyeing Versace—but she won’t be the only one
item.description: “Versace is on everyone’s table,” said Miuccia Prada, the owner of the eponymous brand founded by her grandfather.

item.title: Wall Street worried that new tariffs will turn the Trump bump into a slump—analysts warn the bulk of action is yet to come
item.description: Even unfilled tariff threats are beginning to alter consumer and business behavior, with markets stumbling on news of yet more sanctions on China.

item.title: Trump appoints Paul Dabbar, Hung Cao to positions within administration

item.title: The Bishops Are Right to Sue the Federal Government over Refugee Resettlement
item.description: Whatever the outcome of the case, the Catholic Church’s mission to assist legally admitted refugees is clear and convincing.

item.title: Trump DOJ: The FBI Is Withholding ‘Thousands Of Pages’ Of Epstein Files
item.description: The FBI is withholding 'thousands of pages of documents' related to sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein, according to AG Pam Bondi.
